name: Meoyr
description:
This game is about a white cube that must reach the exit and overcome obstacles. The game has already 10 levels, training, a start menu and a choice of the level that you need.

Control: PC

Keys w, a, s, d - movements.

Key r - restart.

Worked on the game: programmer: Alexander Turkov, Designer: Enotik, Game studio : PancakeGame, LVL design: mag1nn1
